Name: CMC/IMU Power Down
checklistText:
CMC/IMU Power Down
			(P06) CMC Power Down

		Perform DAP Activation
			Load 0 (no DAP) in left digit of R1

	1 Key V37E 06E
		DSKY - P06

	2 FL V50 N25
		00062 (CMC pwr down)

		PRO (push till STBY lt - on)
		CMC blanks DSKY dis


			IMU Power Down

Panel 1:
	1 CMC MODE - FREE

Panel 100:
	2 G/N IMU PWR - OFF

	3 If CMC operating

Panel 2, 140:
	Key V37E XXE

			
					CAUTION

				Only in case of emer shall IMU
				be powered down beyond stby:

Panel 5:
		cb IMU HTR (2)  - open
